amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the "off-premises" ordering exception from bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 258, 1 Present (Roll no. 80).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 258, 1 Present (Roll no. 80).
